abstract: Revolt inside Tecumseh State Correctional Institution in Nebraska leaves two inmates dead and several others injured; guards retake control of complex within hours.
lead_paragraph: Two other inmates were hospitalized after the riot at the Tecumseh State Correctional Institution, during which prisoners took control of part of the complex and set fires, officials said.

headline.main: Rampaging Inmates Kill 2 at a Nebraska Prison Described as Understaffed
headline.print_headline: Rampaging Inmates Kill 2 at a Nebraska Prison Described as Understaffed

snippet: Two other inmates were hospitalized after the riot at the Tecumseh State Correctional Institution, during which prisoners took control of part of the complex and set fires, officials said.
